cumulated.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wi(wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, c3)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, co(c3, cmin, c2)), c0)))

comment: If cyclically shifting a word by two positions results in the same word, cyclically shifting the word by the difference of these two positions results in the original word itself. (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)
